00052   void
00053   processOptions(const FMS_Data::LsTransferOptions_ptr& options, std::string& sqlRequest) {
00054 
00055     bool onlyProgressFile = true;
00056 
00057     //To check if the transferId is defined
00058     if (options->getTransferId().size() != 0) {
00059       //To check the transfer Id
00060       checkTransferId(options->getTransferId());
00061       //To add the transferId on the request
00062       addOptionRequest("transferid", options->getTransferId(), sqlRequest);
00063       onlyProgressFile = false;
00064     }
00065 
00066     //To check if the fromMachineId is defined
00067     if (options->getFromMachineId().size() != 0) {
00068       //To add the fromMachineId on the request
00069       
00070       sqlRequest.append(" and (sourceMachineId='"+options->getFromMachineId()+"'"+" or destinationMachineId='"+options->getFromMachineId()+"')");
00071       
00072       onlyProgressFile = false;
00073     }
00074 
00075     //To check if the userId is defined
00076     if (options->getUserId().size() != 0) {
00077 
00078       //Creation of the object user
00079       UserServer userServer = UserServer(msessionServer);   
00080 
00081       userServer.init();
00082       if (!userServer.isAdmin()) {
00083         UMSVishnuException e (ERRCODE_NO_ADMIN);
00084         throw e;
00085       } 
00086     
00087       //To check the user Id
00088       checkUserId(options->getUserId());
00089       //To add the userId on the request
00090       addOptionRequest("userId", options->getUserId(), sqlRequest);
00091       onlyProgressFile = false;
00092     }
00093 
00094     //To check the file transfer status
00095     if (options->getStatus() != 4) { // UNDEFINED FILE TRANSFER STATUS
00096       //To check the file status
00097       checkStatus(options->getStatus());
00098       //To add the status on the request
00099       addOptionRequest("status", convertToString(options->getStatus()), sqlRequest);
00100     } else {
00101       if(onlyProgressFile) {
00102         addOptionRequest("status", "0", sqlRequest);
00103       }
00104     }
00105 
00106   }
00107 
00113   FMS_Data::FileTransferList*
00114     list() {
00115   
00116       std::string sqlListOfFiles = "SELECT transferId, filetransfer.status, userId, clientMachineId, sourceMachineId, "
00117         "destinationMachineId, sourceFilePath, destinationFilePath, fileSize, startTime,errorMsg,"
00118         " trCommand from filetransfer, vsession "
00119           "where vsession.numsessionid=filetransfer.vsession_numsessionid";
00120 
00121       std::vector<std::string>::iterator iter;
00122       std::vector<std::string> results;
00123 
00124       FMS_Data::FMS_DataFactory_ptr ecoreFactory = FMS_Data::FMS_DataFactory::_instance();
00125       mlistObject = ecoreFactory->createFileTransferList();
00126 
00127       msessionServer.check();
00128 
00129       processOptions(mparameters, sqlListOfFiles);
00130       sqlListOfFiles.append(" order by startTime");
00131 
00132       
00133       boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> ListOfFiles (mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlListOfFiles.c_str()));
00134       
00135       time_t startTime;
00136         
00137 
00138       if (ListOfFiles->getNbTuples() != 0){
00139       
00140         
00141         for (size_t i = 0; i < ListOfFiles->getNbTuples(); ++i) {
00142           results.clear();
00143           results = ListOfFiles->get(i);
00144           iter = results.begin();
00145 
00146           FMS_Data::FileTransfer_ptr filetransfer = ecoreFactory->createFileTransfer();
00147 
00148           
00149           filetransfer->setTransferId(*iter);
00150           int trStatus=convertToInt(*(++iter));
00151           filetransfer->setStatus((trStatus >=0&& trStatus<5 ? trStatus:4));
00152           filetransfer->setUserId(*(++iter));
00153           filetransfer->setClientMachineId(*(++iter));
00154           filetransfer->setSourceMachineId(*(++iter));
00155           filetransfer->setDestinationMachineId(*(++iter));
00156           filetransfer->setSourceFilePath(*(++iter));
00157           filetransfer->setDestinationFilePath(*(++iter));
00158           filetransfer->setSize(convertToInt(*(++iter)));
00159           //convert the endDate into UTC date
00160           std::string tmpTime = *(++iter);
00161           startTime = convertLocaltimeINUTCtime(convertToTimeType(tmpTime)); 
00162           filetransfer->setStart_time(startTime);
00163           filetransfer->setErrorMsg(*(++iter));
00164           // Check the transfer Command enum value
00165           int trCommand=convertToInt(*(++iter));
00166 
00167           filetransfer->setTrCommand( (trCommand >=0&& trCommand<3 ? trCommand:2) );
00168           mlistObject->getFileTransfers().push_back(filetransfer);
00169         }
00170       }
00171 
00172       return mlistObject;
00173     }

00197   void checkTransferId(std::string transferId) {
00198     std::string sqlTransferRequest = "SELECT transferId from filetransfer where transferId='"+transferId+"'";
00199     boost::scoped_ptr<DatabaseResult> transfer(mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlTransferRequest.c_str()));
00200     if(transfer->getNbTuples()==0) {
00201       throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "Invalid transfer identifier");;
00202     }
00203   }
00204 
00209   void checkStatus(int status) {
00210       
00211     if(status < 0 || status > 4) {
00212       throw UserException(ERRCODE_INVALID_PARAM, "The file transfer status option value is incorrect");
00213     }
00214   }
